Articles.Content: This is my first attempt at a faceted surface aircraft, and to me, I think I did pretty well. This craft is surprisingly stable, it never flapped like a bird (like some of mine tend to do). It can reach sustained hi-altitude flight at 15,000 metres, and has really good air grip. Plus the way I made this makes the afterburners really look menacing at night. Its max speed gets over Mach 1, but surprise me if it can do better.
Woah, I really like the looks of this ship, I'm going to try it out right away.
Pretty cool plane! It is good to fly with.
